name: paymentAuthorizationViewController(_:didSelectShippingContact:handler:)
desc: Tells the delegate that the user selected a shipping address, and asks for an updated payment request.
declaration:
optional func paymentAuthorizationViewController(_ controller: PKPaymentAuthorizationViewController, 
                        didSelectShippingContact contact: PKContact, 
                                         handler completion: @escaping (PKPaymentRequestShippingContactUpdate) -> Void)
